alert.note: Alert for Grant; La Salle (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 1:16PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Grant and northern La Salle Parishes through 145 PM CST... At 116 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Ball, or 14 miles north of Pineville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jena, Olla, Midway, Urania, Pollock, Dry Prong, Tullos, Georgetown, Zenoria, Fishville, Bentley and Rochelle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
